intro: Dendrorkis setifera, commonly known as the slender-leafed dendrorkis, is a species of flowering plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in countries like Thailand and Malaysia. The plant is characterized by its slender, elongated leaves and small, delicate orchid-like flowers. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as forest understories. Due to its specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
